definition: notion consisting of a narrow strip of fine material used for trimming
details:
noun
- notion consisting of a narrow strip of fine material used for trimming
- a long strip of inked material for making characters on paper with a typewriter
= synonyms: typewriter ribbon
- an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
= synonyms: decoration
- any long object resembling a thin line
= example: any long object resembling a thin line
= synonyms: thread
